pages.text:
Your very first $(thing)resource loop/$ you'll automate will require you to set up $(4)mechanical power generation/$ and craft a $(item)millstone/$, $(item)press/$ and $(item)basin/$.$(p)Check $(4)routing power/$ if you need some help connecting these components together.$(p)These machines can be operated manually by simply$(p)              $(t:32x Gravel
32x Flint
8x Sand)$(bold)[Requirements]/$

throwing items on the $(item)millstone/$ or into the $(item)basin/$, and right-clicking to empty them. But in the long run, you will have to use Create's $(item)funnels/$ and $(item)belts/$ to automate this process.$(p)The following pages have images of some example setups to help you get going yourself.$(p)Further milling of $(item)sand/$ will yield $(item)limesand/$, which along with the other two blocks can get you $(l:renewables/05_metals)metal nuggets/$.

pages.title: Millstone
pages.text: The $(item)millstone/$ benefits greatly from running at $(4)higher speeds/$.

pages.title: Mechanical Press
pages.text: Creating a full loop with both machines is left up to you.
